examples.description: raises a ZeroDivisionError for dividing by zero
examples.full_description: Not having any errors and being all green ZeroDivisionError raises a ZeroDivisionError for dividing by zero

examples.full_description: Not having any errors and being all green ZeroDivisionError NameError raises a NameError when encountering undefined barewords
